messages:
Name: Ángel Mena
Nationality: Ecuador
Date of Birth: January 21, 1988
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Pachuca
Liga MX clubs played for: Cruz Azul, León, Pachuca

Ángel Mena, the Pachuca midfielder, has made five appearances in this season's Liga MX, with five of these coming for his current club. He had previously played for León in the competition during 2024/2025.
The last league game that Mena played came on October 22 for Pachuca against Santos Laguna; a meeting that he played 34 minutes in during a 1-1 draw. He has been shown one yellow card.
In the side's next Liga MX game on February 8, Pachuca face a trip to Cruz Azul.
In last season's Liga MX, Mena played in 32 games for León, scored six goals and provided seven assists.
Before moving to Pachuca in July 2024, Mena made 187 league appearances in total at León, scoring 70 goals and providing 38 assists.
